column5: Me and my regular fishing partner are going to hitch up my boat tomorrow seeing as the forecast is too nice to pass up (god I love being self employed) targetting late season eyes, pike, bass or perch in Huron's North Channel @ the mouth of the Spanish River and beyond.   Anyone with advice?  I'll bring the steel line set up, the riggers and a mix of different rod/reel combos.   Any and all suggestions appreciated!   Cheers.  Gonna throw it all at them until something produces!
